Action.Name: Demonstrates use of the TCPEvents EventGhost plugin with authentication disabled.
For use with the EtherEvent NoAuthentication example sketch.
Configure the TCP Events plugin with your network settings(leave the password field blank):

Macro.Name: Send test event

Action.Name: This macro will send a test event every time the event TCP.test is received.

Macro.Action: TCPEvents.SendEvent(u'192.168.69.104', 1024, u'', u'test', u'event', u'"test payload"', None)
